about_the_game:
Small creatures, but massive destruction! 

In this colorful survivors-like, summon your trusted allies, the Chuminis, to battle hords of forest demons! It’s up to you to manage each Chumini’s unique behavior to survive for 20 minutes, and defeat the Evil Shaman. They’re 12 (reduced to 6 for the demo!) different Chuminis to choose from: find the best synergies that suit your playstyle!

Gameplay 

Collect experience from the defeated demons, build your army of powerful allies and upgrade them to survive! Some Chuminis will run in a circle around you, others will follow your every step… Optimize your movement to take advantage of your allies!

Content of the demo

  • 6 different creatures to summon, upgrade, and use in battle

  • 10 unique enemies and 1 boss

  • Colorful hand-drawn graphics

  • A meta-progression system offering replayability and difficulty levels!

short_description: In this survivors-like game, summon an army of tiny Chuminis to battle waves of forest demons. Each Chumini has its own movement patterns: it's up to you to manage this merry mess to create an unstoppable force!
